title: Wordle (ES)
author: [Pk11](https://github.com/Epicpkmn11)
description: Wordle DS translated to Spanish, based on Daniel Rodriguez's [Wordle (ES)](https://wordle.danielfrg.com/).

title: Numberle DS
author: [ItsSiem](https://www.github.com/itssiem)
description: Wordle DS but with numbers instead of letters.

title: Wordle (IT)
author: [brownboi2](https://github.com/brownboi2)
description: An Italian translation mod for WordleDS by brownboi2, a non-italian using Google Translate and an Italian word bank.
